Moving From Github Pages

Sep 02, 2015

This is my first blog POST after moving to this website from Github Pages

So from the moment I learnt to code, I guess I was lucky enough to know about Github Pages and I immediately spun up a one-page personal website and that was the coolest thing I had done among my friends. It's a mixture of Git's version control and Jekyll and I think it's the best way to maintain code and a simple blog.

This website is a layout fork of Tate Johnson's site with minor modifications. Stay tuned for interesting stuff.

Viscount..
